dialog_divide_all.message:
"Include all windows" is enabled.

dialog_ignorePathname.message: Note that "hash" and "query" are not ignored by simply enabling this option.

dialog_noConfirm.message: From now on, the task will be executed without displaying a confirmation dialog.
